00027 #include <Inventor/lists/SbPList.h>
00028 
00029 class SoField;
00030 
00031 class COIN_DLL_API SoFieldList : public SbPList {
00032 public:
00033   SoFieldList(void) : SbPList() { }
00034   SoFieldList(const int sizehint) : SbPList(sizehint) { }
00035   SoFieldList(const SoFieldList & l) : SbPList(l) { }
00036   
00037   void append(SoField * field) { 
00038     SbPList::append((void *) field); 
00039   }
00040   void insert(SoField * field, const int insertbefore) {
00041     SbPList::insert((void *) field, insertbefore); 
00042   }
00043 
00044   SoField * operator [](const int idx) const {
00045     return (SoField*) SbPList::operator[](idx);
00046   }
00047   void set(const int idx, SoField * field) {
00048     SbPList::operator[](idx) = (void*) field;
00049   }
00050   SoField * get(const int idx) const {
00051     return (SoField*) SbPList::get(idx);
00052   }
00053 };
00054 
00055 #endif // !COIN_SOFIELDLIST_H
